channel.title: Making Buildings
channel.description:
[b]How Do You Make Buildings..?[/b]
- How do you make buildings.. Examples: - Making walls..? with decorations and windows - making floors with designes.
Is This Possible.?
Please mail me if you know a way
[b]Thanks, Vic[/b]
[b]DO NOT SPAM THIS TOPIC! OR ELSE ILL REMOVE[/b]

item.dc:creator: @str_rockstar str rockstar
item.description:
@str_rockstar wrote:

lol i think i know how

ok so find like a basic wall or at range guild the concreet door or w/e get the code then make a wall in that stuff and then get a door id and add that as a door then you got yourself a pretty basic house or w/e

Read full topic

item.title: Making Buildings
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

[quote=“Lagex, post:13, topic:194760”]First off, you need global objects. If you want them, look up a tutorial, since my 10 year old brother can do it.
Second, you need to know coding. If you don’t know basic Java, then leave, because moparscape should be about real coding, and not a bunch of noobs.
Third, please don’t act like an ignorant jew. It makes mopar look bad, and makes yourself look bad.
Fourth, if you can’t find a ****ing wall id, you’re an idiot, because I found 3 for 3 different designs. I even made a little shack because I was bored.

Please, all noobs, leave mopar immediately! You’re not wanted![/quote]Time to leave then ?

this is a HELP SECTION you need to understand that all coders in here cant search hours for 1 id …

if you get more xp you will now …

Read full topic

item.title: Making Buildings
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

First off, you need global objects. If you want them, look up a tutorial, since my 10 year old brother can do it.
Second, you need to know coding. If you don’t know basic Java, then leave, because moparscape should be about real coding, and not a bunch of noobs.
Third, please don’t act like an ignorant jew. It makes mopar look bad, and makes yourself look bad.
Fourth, if you can’t find a ****ing wall id, you’re an idiot, because I found 3 for 3 different designs. I even made a little shack because I was bored.

Please, all noobs, leave mopar immediately! You’re not wanted!

Read full topic
